price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߣߴߌ ߡߊ߫ ߝߘߊ߫ ߌߟߋ߬ ߟߎ߯ߕߎ߫ ߸ ߌ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߬ߓߐ߬ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߍ߯
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
